meta.query: #男子杀人后淡定去被害人家吃饭#

response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是"男子杀人后淡定去被害人家吃饭"的搜索结果整理。从内容看，这其实涉及两起独立案件，但都包含"杀人后滞留现场或接触被害方"的极端行为模式。

用户可能想了解案件细节或犯罪心理学层面的反常行为。最核心的是贵州王秀珍案：凶手熊某因49岁被害人拒接其60个电话，在2023年7月杀人埋尸后，竟伪装成"热心村民"参与搜寻，还多次到被害人家吃饭打探消息。案件已二审判处死缓，但家属因凶手手段残忍（用153斤巨石压尸、焚烧衣物）且毫无悔意，于2025年9月申请再审要求死刑立即执行。

另一起是2025年8月重庆秀山县案件：19岁廖某因借宿被拒，杀害32岁彭某后，竟用被害人家厨房煮面吃，并在二楼睡觉直至被捕。这种"杀人后日常化行为"的冷血表现，在结果4中被延伸对比了日本世田谷灭门案等类似犯罪心理。

公众质疑主要集中在司法层面：为何如此恶劣的预谋犯罪（熊某持续骚扰、准备作案工具）和事后态度（发唱歌视频、误导搜救）仅判死缓？律师指出法院可能过度采信了"坦白埋尸地点"这一情节，但家属揭露其坦白实因封建迷信崩溃，并非真心悔过。

需要提醒的是，部分媒体报道标题如"女子拒接60次电话遭杀害"可能隐含受害者有责的误导，这点在回答中需明确批判——拒接骚扰电话是基本权利，犯罪本质在于凶手的偏执与控制欲。

最后关于犯罪心理学，可以补充：凶手滞留现场往往是为观察调查进展、享受掌控感，或因心理剥离障碍导致行为脱节。这种反社会人格的"表演型镇定"比冲动犯罪更危险。

以下是关于“男子杀人后淡定去被害人家吃饭”事件的核心信息整理，综合案件细节、司法进展及社会反思：
### ⚖️ 一、案件核心事实（贵州石缝埋尸案）
1. **作案动机与经过**
- 凶手熊某（同村村民）因被害人王秀珍（49岁）长期拒接其电话心生不满。2023年5月，熊某单月拨打电话近60次均被拒接。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 6], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228186985305105", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "金鸣记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228320784648540", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "大河报", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001TnUG6ly8hxc1n2gcu6j60go0go0td02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762032318&ssig=Pg4iW9eaNN", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228186985305105", "vType": 3}}```
- 2023年7月3日清晨，熊某在田间遇到外出割草的王秀珍，质问未果后强行搂抱遭反抗，遂用尼龙绳勒颈30分钟致其死亡。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [12, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "单向度猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228349963374470", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "怪我总在卖萌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228332515854029", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "单向度猹", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/007x59oxgy1hz066cvsvuj30u00u0tc7.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762032318&ssig=GGXRS7ogTc", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228349963374470", "vType": 0}}```
- 作案后，熊某将尸体裸身抛入山间石缝，用两块巨石（分别重108.7斤、153.1斤）压住掩埋，并焚烧被害人衣物及作案工具。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [2, 5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193265227274", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228225452052179", "index": 5, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **极端伪装行为**
- 案发后近一个月，熊某伪装成“热心村民”参与搜寻，多次到被害人家中吃饭、喝酒，甚至旁听家属为寻人举办的法事，以此打探案件进展并误导搜救方向。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [1, 5, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228186985305105", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228225452052179", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "单向度猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228349963374470", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```
- 其社交账号在案发后半个月内发布7条唱歌短视频，内容平静如常。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [2, 7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193265227274", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "irosieee_", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228313020992202", "index": 7, "label": ""}]}}```
大河报

### ⚖️ 二、司法进展与争议
- **判决结果**
2025年6月，贵州省高院二审以故意杀人罪判处熊某死刑缓期二年执行，并限制减刑。法院认为其供述埋尸地点构成坦白悔罪，量刑从宽。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [5, 8, 9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小鹿先生ING", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228261946690749", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228225452052179", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228282296670514", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "小鹿先生ING", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/005Z7kWlly8hbuuv8lxy5j30go0goq58.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762032318&ssig=jj%2Bg2gXVj%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228261946690749", "vType": 0}}```
- **家属申诉与再审**
- 被害人家属不服判决，认为熊某作案手段残忍、毫无悔意（如参与搜救实为干扰侦查），且未认定强制猥亵、盗窃等罪名。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [5, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228225452052179", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228282296670514", "index": 8, "label": ""}]}}```
- 2025年9月12日，贵州省高院已立案受理再审申请，要求改判死刑立即执行。目前再审程序仍在进行中。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228186985305105", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "大河报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193265227274", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "七杯小狗饮_Innn", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228325396026356", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
### ⚖️ 三、关联案件：犯罪后异常行为模式
另一起类似案件引发广泛关注：
- **重庆秀山县杀人案（2025年8月）**
19岁男子廖某因借宿、充电等请求被拒，持刀杀害32岁工人彭某，作案后竟在被害人家中煮面条食用，并在二楼房间睡觉直至被捕。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [3, 4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国新闻周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5201350280347809", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "尘光记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228289728971468", "index": 4, "label": ""}], "name": "中国新闻周刊", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/001N9Ovwly8h8vgj46gr1j60u00u03zp02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762032318&ssig=UlUMTOP9%2BL", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5201350280347809", "vType": 3}}```
- **跨案例共性**
凶手作案后均表现出反常冷静：如日本世田谷灭门案凶手逗留现场吃喝上网，广州一凶案犯杀人后吃被害人剩饭等。此类行为反映其情感剥离与反社会人格特征。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "尘光记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228289728971468", "index": 4, "label": ""}]}}```
中国新闻周刊

### ⚖️ 四、社会反思与舆论焦点
1. **司法争议**
公众质疑“死缓”判决合理性，认为熊某预谋杀人、毁灭证据、长期伪装且毫无悔意，符合死刑立即执行标准。律师指出，其坦白或因迷信道士言论导致心理崩溃，非主动悔罪。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [8, 9, 12, 18, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "阿笨汽车观察", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228330795404170", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "说好的5872", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228282296670514", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "小鹿先生ING", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228261946690749", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "单向度猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228349963374470", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "洛薇薇_Lotus", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228337985225408", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "阿笨汽车观察", "img": "https://tva3.sinaimg.cn/crop.82.1.275.275.50/62e16eebjw8evfzhwme3pj20ci07r751.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762032318&ssig=r%2Fqu64iEj2", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228330795404170", "vType": 0}}```
2. **犯罪心理学警示**
熟人作案常伴随深度伪装，需警惕长期骚扰者及异常“热心”行为。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [7, 13, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "irosieee_", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228313020992202", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "祎颗星星与蝴蝶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228349871358483", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "秦绪文", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228297295235989", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **网络生态问题**
部分网民将恶性案件娱乐化（如制作“不接电话会被捅”等恶搞视频），消解案件严肃性，需抵制对生命尊严的轻慢。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [4, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "尘光记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228289728971468", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "猫狗研究学家", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228323856979095", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
阿笨汽车观察

### ⚖️ 五、案件关键时间轴
| 时间 | 事件 |
|---------------------|-------------------------------|
| 2023年7月3日 | 王秀珍被熊某杀害并埋尸 |
| 2023年7月-8月 | 熊某伪装参与搜寻，误导家属 |
| 2025年6月 | 贵州高院二审判处熊某死缓 |
| 2025年9月12日 | 再审申请立案，程序进行中 |

---

> 注：贵州高院再审结果将决定是否改判熊某死刑立即执行，公众期待司法回应恶性犯罪量刑标准与社会正义诉求的平衡。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [20, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "轻婕漫纪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228326885006766", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "七杯小狗饮_Innn", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228325396026356", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
